bibl.title: Demography of the Late Roman-Early Byzantine Cemetery at Wadi Qitna.

series.title: Studien zur altägyptischen Kultur. Beihefte. Band

bibl.note: A demographic study comprising 520 individual tumuli and 56 non-funeral structures (IIIrd-Vth cent. A.D.).

bibl.title: Akten des vierten Internationalen Ägyptologen Kongresses München 1985

bibl.seg: Strouhal Eugen, Demography of the Late Roman-Early Byzantine Cemetery at Wadi Qitna.
Sylvia Schoske (Hg.), Akten des vierten Internationalen Ägyptologen Kongresses München 1985 = Studien zur altägyptischen Kultur. Beihefte. Band 1 (Hamburg, 1988) pp. 339-349, 6 graphiques.
A demographic study comprising 520 individual tumuli and 56 non-funeral structures (IIIrd-Vth cent. A.D.).
